TopicTitle: Video Tutorial: A Perfectly Synchronized Relay Satellite Constellation, The Easy Way

Articles.Content: Note that, while this is being done in my hardcore no-revert no-quicksave career playthrough, with a handful of mods, none of those mods affect physics, and the parts of the shown ships are entirely stock (except for the KER computer). Kerbal Engineer is the only mod needed to follow this tutorial.
